Data Structures | Macros | Enumerations | Functions
am_hal_clkmgr.h File Reference

Clock manager functions that manage system clocks and minimize power consumption by powering down clocks when possible. More...

Detailed Description

Clock manager functions that manage system clocks and minimize power consumption by powering down clocks when possible.

Go to the source code of this file.
